structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Police officers, firefighter personnel, firefighters, corrections personnel, and labor organizations not to participate in strike.
law.text: No police officer, firefighter personnel, firefighter, or corrections officer of an urban-county government shall engage in, and no police officer labor organization, firefighter personnel labor organization, firefighter labor organization, or corrections officer labor organization shall sponsor or condone, any strike.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 177, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 10, effective July 13, 2004.
